content: Hello! Welcome to BPI's intelligent banking assistant. How may I assist you today?

suggestions.suggestion: Hello! Welcome to BPI's intelligent banking assistant. How may I assist you today?

content: Para magpadala ng remittance gamit ang BPI, piliin ang alinman sa mga sumusunod: (1) BPI Online/Mobile App – mag-log in, piliin 'Transfer Money' > 'To Another Local Bank' o 'To BPI Account', ilagay ang detalye ng beneficiary at amount; (2) BPI Pamana Padala – buksan ang account na ito (zero maintaining balance kung may minimum 4 remittances kada taon) para mas mabilis na domestic fund transfer; (3) Over-the-counter sa BPI branches o partner remittance centers. Siguraduhing meron kang 2 valid IDs at, kung OFW, magdala ng latest employment contract at proof of remittance.

response.translated_message:
The translation of "paano mag remittance" is "How to make a remittance".

In the context of banking and finance, remittance refers to the act of sending money to another person or entity, often across borders or through online channels. The phrase "paano mag remittance" is asking for guidance or instructions on how to accomplish this task.

suggestions.suggestion: Para magpadala ng remittance gamit ang BPI, piliin ang alinman sa mga sumusunod: (1) BPI Online/Mobile App – mag-log in, piliin 'Transfer Money' > 'To Another Local Bank' o 'To BPI Account', ilagay ang detalye ng beneficiary at amount; (2) BPI Pamana Padala – buksan ang account na ito (zero maintaining balance kung may minimum 4 remittances kada taon) para mas mabilis na domestic fund transfer; (3) Over-the-counter sa BPI branches o partner remittance centers. Siguraduhing meron kang 2 valid IDs at, kung OFW, magdala ng latest employment contract at proof of remittance.

Kapag nagpadala ka via BPI Online/Mobile App sa ibang BPI account, real-time ang posting kung within cut-off (8:00 PM on weekdays, 3:30 PM on Saturdays). Para sa interbank (InstaPay), real-time din kung within cut-off (8:00 PM daily). Ang bayad ay Php 10-50 depende sa channel. Kung sa branch ka magpapadala, cut-off ay 3:00 PM; after nito, kinabukasan na mapopost.

Kung madalas kang mag-remit, buksan ang BPI Pamana Padala: zero maintaining balance basta 4 remittances/year, libreng life insurance coverage na katumbas ng average deposit balance (hanggang Php 500,000), at libreng 4 withdrawal transactions kada buwan sa BPI ATMs. Pwede ring mag-open ng BPI US Dollar Savings account para iwas foreign-exchange risk; minimum initial deposit ay USD 500 at maintaining balance ay USD 500.

Mga karaniwang bayad: (1) BPI to BPI online – Php 0; (2) InstaPay interbank – Php 10-50; (3) BPI branch over-the-counter – Php 100-500 depende sa amount. Para sa foreign currency remittance, may 0.85% BPI fee + 1% Mastercard/Visa assessment fee (total 1.85%) kung ang transaction ay processed ng foreign acquirer, kahit PHP ang billing.
